name: Luck Of The Traveller
description:
 You play as Ise, a High School Girl, who got transported to a mysterious and magical Dungeon full of BEASTS! At first, you woke up in a mysterious dungeon only to be greeted by monsters you have never seen before. Guided by a <>, you learn to fight with brawl and brains! Once you defeat the boss of the dungeon, you will finally be set free and return back to where you came from!

o TEAM MEMBERS

o Roles & Contribution

 Tiffany: Main Programmer for all Scenes.

 Kelly: Dungeons, Battle Scene layout, Game Layout Design for all Scenes.

 Sufi: Presentor, GDD, Music and Sound assets(aka Battle Music, Boss music etc..), Game Logo Design, Game Trailer, Draft Presentation slides.
